Description:
Detects when an attacker tries to add a new network provider in order to dump clear text credentials, similar to how the NPPSpy tool does it

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Credential Dumping Attempt Using New NetworkProvider - REG
Query:
sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\system\currentcontrolset\services\%' and target_object like '%
etworkprovider%') and  not ((target_object like '%\system\currentcontrolset\services\webclient
etworkprovider%' or target_object like '%\system\currentcontrolset\services\lanmanworkstation
etworkprovider%' or target_object like '%\system\currentcontrolset\servicesdpnp
etworkprovider%') or process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\poqexec.exe'))
